content: X-PN G2 MX Plywood pins Premium collated nails for fastening plywood to steel framing using the GX 2 gas nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features With knurled shank, optimized for fastening plywood and OSB to cold-formed steel framing Faster and more productive than traditional methods using screws Unique knurling geometry for improved reliability and higher load performance One fastener length covers the most common shear wall applications involving 14-20 gauge cold-formed steel framing Applications Fastening plywood sheets to metal frames ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.11 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | GX 2 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 3560567 - Plywood pin X-PN 37 G2 (1100)+GC52 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1100x Plywood pin X-PN 37 G2 MX - 1x Gas can GC 52 for GX 2 - 3560568 - Plywood pin X-PN 37 G2 11,000+GC52 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 11000x Plywood pin X-PN 37 G2 MX - 11x Gas can GC 52 for GX 2
tag_description: Premium collated nails for fastening plywood to steel framing using the GX 2 gas nailer
